ModMetaData.name: SpecificWorkJobGiver - Dev Build
ModMetaData.author: Taggerung
ModMetaData.description: Base game puts most work types into a single JobGiver_Work, this allows you to specify a single worktype by hand for more custom job assignment.\n\nThis is a micro-library, as a player you will not use this directly. (This is the dev version of SpecificWorkJobGiver. The release version of About.xml is available for editing at About/About-Release.xml. Edits made on this file or on the temporary About/About.xml won't show up on the release version. Use VisualStudio to build a "Release" version of this mod when ready to upload your mod!)
